articles.title: Los Angeles mayor says virus spreading within households - KRON4
articles.description: The pandemic is getting worse in Los Angeles as the coronavirus spreads rapidly within households and Californians let their guard down, according to Mayor Eric Garcetti, who said Sunday that the nation’s most populous county is recording a new COVID-19 case …

articles.author: William Schomberg, Elizabeth Piper
articles.title: 'Pivotal moment' as Britain set to roll out AstraZeneca vaccine - Reuters
articles.description: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson on Monday ordered England into a new national lockdown to contain a surge in COVID-19 cases that threatens to overwhelm parts of the health system before a vaccine programme reaches a critical mass.
